name: The Panson Fyre Game Show
description:
Designed in 7 days, for the Community Games Jam, hosted by a collection of the best Online Developers around. The theme for the jam was "The Game is a Liar".

On the face of it, The Panson Fyre Game Show seems like a cheery experience, but for those brave enough to take off the rose-tinted glasses and witness the real events taking place, it's quite a different scenario...

Designed and Created in Unity, by Ben Wright.
